column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This is the new kid on the block of popular eats in htown
column2: and I must say I love this place!!!  It is a cafe and bakery which is super cute with open seating/communal table seating both inside and outside on their patio area
column4: you can people watch thanks to windows everywhere!  You can even sit around the barista station and watch the baristas do their magic.  Sadly
column5: I also caught one continuously touching their hair and other random parts of their body and then serving drinks...I was quite disturbed.  I actually ordered a latte which was just average
column6: but they do get their roast from Boomtown
column7: so you gotta love local!  OK
column8: down to the serious stuff... food!
